website_summaries.verdict: Though occasional leaks are a concern, there are more satisfied customers due to its comfortable, adjustable fit and mid-level weight range.
pros: Owners rave about its slim fit, thanks to the patented contoured FLEX weight construction and easy-to-adjust belt
cons: There have been a few reports of sand leakage from the weight compartments

customer_reviews.title: ... and running / hiking and so far i really like how it fits
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for about 2 months now with both crossfit training and running / hiking and so far i really like how it fits. As with any vest, they get hot but I was able to do a 5k with the vest (with 10lbs) and have done several hikes (yesterday 12 miles) and getting more and more comfortable wearing the vest. For crossfit, i have used it with pushups, pullups, squats, box jumps and works well and doesnt move during the WODs. Overall i would recommend and several folks at our box have purchased
customer_reviews.author: John Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: Burpee and running approved.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tight fit for burpees and running. Better than other vests that bounce around and won't stay centered, no matter how tight you try to get them.
customer_reviews.author: coffeemedic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adding weight for pullups
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for adding weight for pullups, pushups, runs, or eliptical training. Add the weights in and go! Taking them out to wash occasionally is a pain, but the way this fits compared to other weight vests is wonderful! It fits snug and I can actually go on a run without feeling like Im being pushed down to the ground every stride. The velcro is strong and has lasted a long time. No signs of ripping or tearing either.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: This vest does what it says
customer_reviews.text: It's unfair to deduct a star - except to provide a warning. This vest does what it says, it's a wearable vest that allows you to do basic bodyweight exercises with up to an additional 20 pounds distributed across your upper frame. One caveat. If you have any sort of neck or shoulder problem the shoulder straps are very basic with no padding. I had to modify the straps to add some padding to distribute the load so they didn't pinch my impingement and make my arms, shoulders and neck go numb.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Workout Enhancer.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used this for multiple events including runs and weighted WODs. It has a little bounce to it, but they all do. The weights stay secure and no problems keeping them in/seated. The belly strap stays where you set it. I'm 5'9, 165 and this fits just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Drifter1911

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this vest
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable vest. I use it for warming up before a workout on the stairclimber and for weighted dips and pull-ups. It's very secure for these movements, but I have not tried it running. The only complaint is that when handling the vest (not wearing it) the Velcro grabs and frays the vest material making it look worn out very quickly (like a sweater with pilling).
customer_reviews.author: chris  Mazzarella

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Comfortable Weight Vest
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made weight vest. The stitching and material are heavy duty. The 1lb weights are relatively easy to load, and they stay put during your workout. I'm glad I picked this brand and model, money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: BFH

customer_reviews.title: If you need to add extra weight and burn a few more calories during your morning walk..definitely purchase this vest.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT....I walked around the house with it on to burn extra calories. I'm about 5'4 and It fit perfectly...(Not bone skinny, but athletic)
customer_reviews.author: ARS

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Really snug and comfy. Would highly recommend. There are cheaper weight vests out there, but you'll suffer while wearing them (especially your shoulders). This one will make you happy while you get swole :)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wu

customer_reviews.title: Expeni$ve But Great Vest!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this vest to replace my ZFO 40lb vest which is a lil too bulky when doing different exercises. This vest is much easier to take on/off and doesn't get in the way when switching exercises. Great for push ups/pull ups, calisthenics and running...
customer_reviews.author: W. Samuel

customer_reviews.title: It's good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: It's good for what it is. Fits nice and snug on me. To those who have weights leaking sand, I just wrapped them each in cling wrap. No more issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chun

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: Great for training, however the weight is a bit more straining on the shoulders as opposed to other vests I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGarrett

customer_reviews.title: Its ok... does the job I guess ...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok ... does the job I guess but is extremely difficult to put the individual weights in the vest. Not the most user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Sinha

customer_reviews.title: So easy to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's still heavy and makes the workout tough, but the fit is nice, it rides low enough that it doesn't "bounce" around like some, and there aren't any spots that rub horribly like some. I like the option to change the weight.
customer_reviews.author: P Bock

customer_reviews.title: Good at what it does!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Does everything it is advertised to do, and the inside of the vest is actually quite nice feeling. The ability to adjust the position of the weights so much is also a really nice touch. I'd recommend this to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel McCann

customer_reviews.title: Quality vest
customer_reviews.text: Vest does its job well. I like the adjustable weights to be able to choose the perfect weight for you. Only complaint is that it is a pain to take out and put in weights. It kinda makes it were you have to keep that same weight the whole time or take time out of your workout to switch them.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Turns your walk into a workout
customer_reviews.text: Best piece of fitness equipment I’ve ever purchased. Haven’t run in it yet but started walking in it on my non running days. Started with 8 lbs and added 2 each week until I maxed it out. Walk 3-4 miles in it 3 days a week. Feel so much stronger on my runs. Totally happy. Now I’m looking for something that will hold more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this weighted vest because i want to challenge myself when i go on long walks. The weight is distributed evenly and the strap stays in place. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to increase their strength or just for challenging themselves. Love it! I'm very satisfied with this purchase😊
customer_reviews.author: TracyZ

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely, and stays comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This vest fits good, and is comfortable to work out in. I haven't had any issues with it, and it is easy to adjust the weight to it. I would definitely recommend it for workouts, or even walks and jogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Phiffer

customer_reviews.title: He loves how comfortable it is and we can definitely see improvements in ...
customer_reviews.text: My son works with this nightly. Primarily when doing push ups and pull ups. He also uses when training on the basketball court. He loves how comfortable it is and we can definitely see improvements in his abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Criminal

customer_reviews.title: This weighted vest has worked out great during workouts
customer_reviews.text: This weighted vest has worked out great during workouts. It consistently stays snug while running, jumping, etc. There are 20 - 1 lb. weights so you have the option to make the vest as heavy as you like.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Simchera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product...It's very well made...I use it in my home gym...specifically, when walking on the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect when working out.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, it fits and feels great. My only very small disappointment is the little bit of sand that came out, but that can be fixed with some tape. I can move around in it very well and it doesn't shift when you're moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great. I've taken it on deployments and long trail runs with no problems. It stays tight. I'm happy I got it before the price went up. But it's still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aircraft Maintainer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I considered many other weight vest options on the web & decided to give this one a shot. Received it yesterday and went for an immediate jog after work with only 12 lbs inserted. Love it!! I'm 5'9'' & 200lbs, it fits great to my chest & doesn't rub or slide around. I'm very happy that I decided to go with this one....two thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: By the 2nd mile got pretty stretched out
customer_reviews.text: Felt snug starting murph. By the 2nd mile got pretty stretched out. Wish the shoulder straps were adjustable. All the sweat it absorbed made it heavier too. I'm 5'5, 145
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It works great! Seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a training tool for climbing. It works great! Seems durable, fits slim, and moves well while climbing.
customer_reviews.author: G. whitesides

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice and snug
customer_reviews.text: Fit nice and snug, adjustable for running and other workouts (I use it to train for Murph Challenge, so no rubbing on push ups, pull ups, and squats). Weights inside the vest does not jab or prick as I move. So far, no leaks from the plastic sand weights, and hopefully they stay that way.
customer_reviews.author: Lukman Tanudjaja

customer_reviews.title: Work up a sweat
customer_reviews.text: Does what's it's suppose to. The interchangeable weights are great. I started off with less weight and gradually increased weight as I got stronger. I use it for walking. It makes me sweat a lot because it isn't very breathable, it's a full vest but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and it feels very durable. The nice thing about these lighter vests is that they usually hold together for quite a bit longer than heavier variants.
customer_reviews.author: SA7

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear and easy to add/remove weights.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to add/remove weights and comfortable to wear. Great for adding a little more challenge to my morning walks. Recommend for low impact aerobics...would not recommend for any type of running.
customer_reviews.author: BaR Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Love it . Good calorie burn
customer_reviews.text: My hubby got this and we both use it. I run with it on and workout with it. I love how it doesn't wiggle all over the place because of how it straps on in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Human X weight vest
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and pretty good quality and nicely made. Better than i expected. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: S.J.C

customer_reviews.title: Don't Spend 2x for a vest
customer_reviews.text: I used this vest for the Crossfit WOD Murph. Very comfortable, snug, easy to adjust. Minimal bouncing during the run. Didn't touch hips during squats, full range of motion on both pull ups and push ups. For the money, I haven't worn a better vest.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Vest is comfortable to wear and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a couple months now, to train for Murph challenge. Vest is comfortable to wear and easy to adjust. So far it's held up well. Only thing that I'd let buyers know is that if your a big man this vest will be to small for you. I'm 175lb 5-10 and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This vest is amazing. It is super quick to put on and ...
customer_reviews.text: This vest is amazing. It is super quick to put on and off and the slimness of it is perfect. I have seen a lot of vests with complicated straps and weights that stick out and get caught on things but this one is nothing like those. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SHiZauN

customer_reviews.title: This vest is great - my husband needed it for his medical condition
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great - my husband needed it for his medical condition. It grounds him and allows him to move around the house without his canes. Not to mention that it is making him stronger (what it really is intended to do)
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Sprinkle

customer_reviews.title: Good product. If you have all the weights in
customer_reviews.text: Good product. If you have all the weights in, it's a tiny bit restrictive around the waist...leave out two and it's more comfortable. But I like the full weight and it's not a problem. I don't run or do vigorous stuff so I can speak to that. Mostly T'ai-Chi and slow to medium level activities. It's great for that. Really helps clean up my posture...when you're wearing this thing, anything that's out of alignment gets my attention. ;~)
customer_reviews.author: Gene Burnett

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase. Very well priced
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Very well priced. My first workout using it was Murph and it caused no issues. Have used it 10x the last two months and it has held up wonderfully. Comfortable and not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: J Finley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: by fat best weighted vest I've tried.... Comfortable and does not get in the way when lifting weights. Worth the extra money to get a solid product.... I'm tired of cheap equiptment
customer_reviews.author: Manashevitz

customer_reviews.title: it is a great weight vest
customer_reviews.text: Besides the velcro coming loose sometimes, it is a great weight vest. Additionally the pockets should be double or even triple stitched.
customer_reviews.author: spacey

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for a weighted vest. The quality is nice as well. The pockets for the weights are very sturdy and grip the 1lb weights, so no worries about them falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed. Plates fit properly and velcro waist attachment is all that's needed.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to run in, do pullups, and do push ups, great way to increase the difficulty of workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Abela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems very good. I will report back on how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Iowan

customer_reviews.title: ... in various types of exercise routines and it works great! Easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: I used this weighted vest in various types of exercise routines and it works great! Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Jurado

customer_reviews.title: ... it did little movement so far this is a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ride my bike 7 to 10 miles with it on and it did little movement so far this is a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: willlack

customer_reviews.title: Great for any wod modality
customer_reviews.text: Great vest, fits well, wide velcro straps allow a snug fit so it doesn't move and bounce when running like others do. And lightning fast shipping when I purchased using ground option.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a weighted vest before the HumanX and I am completely satisfied. It is extremely comfortable and stays put, even in hot, humid Florida. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the Crossfit hero workout called MURPH and it performed wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for the Crossfit hero workout called MURPH and it performed wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Rodney deal

customer_reviews.title: Fits well- super adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Great for running- feels great to take it off for the second half of a run!
customer_reviews.author: 4boys4us

customer_reviews.title: Need a vest? Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought it mainly for Murph. Extremely happy with its security while running push ups and etc. i can easily perform WODs with comfort. Easily one of the best vest out there
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great for crossfit
customer_reviews.text: Like: fits all body types. I am 140lb and 5'8", my husband is 220 and 5'10" and it works for both well. Doesn't move around, comfortable. Dislike- none
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Best 20# vest around
customer_reviews.text: Best 20# vest around. Nice and snug with no wiggle while you're working out. Way better than the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Trahan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Great design. We just got it 4 days ago and it works great for our functional and sport specific training.
customer_reviews.author: Cast

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest. Use it when doing p90x plyometrics and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest. Use it when doing p90x plyometrics and chest and back. Works great. Have yet to run in it.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Easy to add or remove weights. Most comfortable weight vest of its type that I've used. Fits me and my wife perfectly, even though we're very different heights and body sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Mario R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably, weight is easily adjustable, this vest is a great addition to my workout routine.
customer_reviews.author: Mitey23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest.
customer_reviews.text: This vest is awesome! First day I got it I ran 3 miles with it and did an intense HIIT workout, this vest kicked my butt and was comfortable the whole time. It is made of really nice material similar to a set suit and conforms well to my body. I'm 5'10'', 180lbs and it fits like a glove. It didn't bounce while running although it does constrict chest heave and heavy breathing some which honestly is just harder training. I have and will continue to recommend this vest to anyone looking to increase the intensity of their workouts.
customer_reviews.author: KevyO4sho

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this weighted vest after having looked through different options offered through Amazon. It is very comfortable to wear, and stays put during my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Truman K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gets used on a every other day basis to enhance my workouts
customer_reviews.author: larry j threadgill jr

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality product
customer_reviews.text: Vest fits nice and securely to your body no matter what your frame is. Additionally, it has a nice liner so that you do not have to wear a shirt under it if you are afraid of chaffing. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: What You is What You Get
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Came exactly as described and the fit was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: GODZBESTYET

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my workout even more intense and looks good on.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio D.

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome vest. It hugged tight on my body
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome vest. It hugged tight on my body. Weight is adjustable. I use it 3-4x a week. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for sealfit training
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I do sealfit training and this is the best vest to move in.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest fits well and stays in place during exercise. I have worn it for periods longer than 12 hours and it has been surprisingly comfortable. The weights are easy to insert and remove and appear to be well made and durable. The vest is also well made and looks like it will last a long time. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: tessarat

customer_reviews.title: good vest!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. I have had it for about a month and seems to hold up good. Also the double velcro straps help it from bouncing on your shoulders real bad.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing amazing amazing great for running working out and more. Sturdy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Expert Appliance Center

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Aesthetic Fits nice Double Velcro belt feels snug Quality Velcro and Stitching ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from the warehouse, and received a Blue HumanX vest. Here are my results Pros: Adjustable Aesthetic Fits nice Double Velcro belt feels snug Quality Velcro and Stitching Lots of inserts for weitghts Cons: Bulky (intended for larger frame) 2lb increments not 1 Not easy to run with Fit is tricky to match
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, no pinch points, good so far. Done a number of workouts including Murph.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because its a pain to keep it clean, I spray it with disinfectant spray but that only last so long and its a pain to remove all the weights every time to clean it but aside from that it wears well to the body, Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great best for any workout. It fits perfectly for any workout.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: It works great providing deep pressure to the shoulder areas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a sensory device for my autistic son. It works great providing deep pressure to the shoulder areas. Interchangeable weights are small plastic blocks which are securely fastened inside the neoprene material pouches. No small metal bars to duck when they are removed.
customer_reviews.author: The Woj

customer_reviews.title: This product worked as advertised. It is made very ...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as advertised. It is made very well! However, it did not work for my particular use, so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ggtbi G.

customer_reviews.title: Humanx Vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is everything the seller said it was. It is finished very nice. I like the fit. It's a quality piece of equipment .would recomend.
customer_reviews.author: gypsy girl

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The inner weight cracked and leaked after one use. :(
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Just used it once and it already started leaking and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used it once and it already started leaking and stained my shirt. Paid 73$ for this thing man..
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Baires

customer_reviews.title: Great vest. Like other reviewers say lose the side ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vest. Like other reviewers say lose the side weights if you are going to be moving around a lot. Will save your ribs
customer_reviews.author: Galen Niederhauser

customer_reviews.title: Beware, this is a "second."
customer_reviews.text: This is a "second", and vendor did not say it was. One shoulder (overlap pad) is longer then the other one, so it fits with one sticking up and one that fits a bit tight. It's usable - but it is inexcusable that the vendor did not alert potential buyers in advance. Amazon you need to look at the ethics of the vendor (which I believe is the actual manufacturer, and not a reseller). I am surprised that Harbinger / Humanx would treat its customers so shabbily.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and is more comfortable than any of weighted vest I've tried. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a moderate weight vest.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER F SHAFFER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Xx heavy and is going to be a challenging piece of PT equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first weighted vest I've ever used and I like it so far. I use it mostly for running, but I have also done squats, pull ups and push ups with it on. It's very comfortable and stays in place if you wear it very tight. The only problem I've noticed with it is that the outermost weights bruised my ribs so I just took them out and now it's great, I could have left them in and not tightened it as much, but then it would bounce. I am a 6' 240 lb. male and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rose

product_meta.title: Harbinger Human X Weight Vest - 20lb/9kg
product_meta.description: Exercising with 20 LB Weight Vest increases resistance and helps build core strength, speed and endurance while doing push-ups, sit-ups, dead lifts, burpees or sprints. Tough abrasion-resistant outer shell resists pulling and tears, while extra-wide, fully adjustable neoprene belt provides full spectrum tensioning. Dual padding cushions shoulders and chest.
feature_bullets: 20LB Weight Vest adjustable in 1LB increments 1 through 20LBS
Patent pending FLEX weight design contours to body while exercising
Exclusive compact design fits securely for max mobility
One size fully adjustable belt for customized fit
Hand wash cold lay flat to dry
